member.name: T:DSCM.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:DSCM.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DSCM.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:DSCM.My.Resources.Resources.namecrash
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Byte[].

member.name: P:DSCM.My.Resources.Resources.Readme
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to

Instructions

  1. Start DSCM
  2. Start Dark Souls
  3. Enjoy Dark Souls Multiplayer :)

Automatic node finding

While DSCM-Net is active, it will automatically connect to players in the same area and in coop level range. Just have it running and enjoy working Dark Souls multiplayer.

Manual Connecting

You can also manually connect to a specific player like this:

  1. Make sure you are connected to less than 20 nodes. You might wa [rest of string was truncated]";.
